name: Get Off My Boat
description:
Sail the high seas in this epic isometric first person physics-based inventory management game! Don’t idle long, you’ll need to continue to process your plunder to keep your boat from going under.

Keep an eye out for evil statues that will hold up your inventory slots at blunderbuss-point, Haul them off your point to clear up the spot, but watch out, where you throw you’ll be slowed.

Created for Global Game Jam 2021 with Ryan Armstrong (Programming) and Chris Sinclair (Art)
